name: Gnocchi with Creamy Lemon Sauce
description: Using affordable easy to find ingredients, you can create a budget-friendly, restaurant worthy gnocchi main course.
preparation: In a 4-Cup Prep Bowl, combine seasoning, cream, and 1⁄2 cup water. Set aside.

Chop broccoli and cauliflower into small pieces. Place cauliflower in Sauté Pan set over medium-high heat. Add remaining 1⁄2 cup water and bring to a boil. Cover; steam for 2 min or until slightly softened.
Add seasoning mixture, gnocchi, and broccoli to pan. Bring back to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer, stirring occasionally for 8–10 min, or until sauce is thick. Add toppings, if desired.
tips: Easy swap: Try frozen veggies in place of fresh ones to lower your grocery bill.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 4 oz (113 g) lean protein.
